titleStmt.title: The excellency of the Christian revelation, as it promiseth assistance, and compleat salvation to sinners a sermon preach'd in the Cathedral Church of St. Paul, November the 6th, 1699, being the eighth, for this year, of the lecture founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esq. / by Samuel Bradford ...
titleStmt.author: Bradford, Samuel, 1652-1731.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
